metadata.Title: CVE-2023-29486 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Heimdal Thor agent versions 3.4.2 and before3.7.0 on Windows, allows attackers to bypass USB access restrictions,execute arbitrary code, and obtain sensitive information via Next-GenAntivirus component.

criterions.comment: heimdal: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
